steps.title: Welcome to Daily Practice
steps.content:
Find a quiet space, wear headphones, and relax your shoulders.

steps.title: SOVT Warmâ€‘Up
steps.copy: Gentle lip trill or hum for about a minute. Keep it easy and relaxed.

steps.title: Pitch Glide
steps.copy: Glide smoothly up, then down through your comfortable range. Aim for steady movement without sudden jumps.

steps.title: Prosody Phrase
steps.copy: Say: "How are you doing?" with a gentle rise at the end. Focus on natural intonation.
